name: Noth-norren
movement: hover and fly with no walking speed
description: The Noth-norren is a gargantuan elemental that embodies chaos, showcasing exceptional strength and dexterity. Its body is surrounded by swirling winds and jagged teeth, emphasizing its chaotic nature.
memorable: The creature can control flying foes and manipulate its environment, creating air turbulence that threatens their stability.
goals: To dominate the battlefield by controlling flying creatures and inflicting chaos on opponents.
relations: Elemental creatures or chaotic beings that align with its nature.
environment: Often found in areas of turbulent air or chaos, such as stormy locales or elemental planes.
strengths: Resistant to various damage types and immune to many conditions, enhancing its durability in battle.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with slam and ranged attacks by throwing debris, along with the ability to fling victims.
most_powerful_ability: Vortex, which pulls creatures into a dangerous swirling mass, dealing slashing damage each turn.
additional_information: Air Turbulence forces flying creatures to land or risk falling.
Magic Weapons allows its attacks to bypass resistances.
Can throw creatures in a vortex of jagged teeth.
test_queries: chaotic gargantuan elemental with air powers
elemental creature that controls flying enemies
vortex monster with swirling winds and teeth
powerful elemental that resists damage and chaos
